name: Zuppa Di Zuchinee
description: Minted zucchini and wild broccoli soup with burrata tortellini, focaccia crouton and baby basil.

name: Verdure Alla Griglia
description: Warm chargrilled vegetables with crushed pine nuts, basil, lemon and pangrattato.

name: Insalata Caprese
description: Buffalo mozzarella, vine-ripened tomatoes and fresh basil leaves with Nicola's Olive Oil.

name: Tuna crudo
description: Thinly sliced raw yellowfin tuna with pickled red onion, marinated raisons pine nuts, parsley dressing & crushed pistachio.

name: Burrata
description: Creamy burrata from Puglia with fried artichokes and shaved black truffle or with datterini tomato, basil and extra virgin olive oil.

name: Margherita
description: D.O.P. San Marzano tomatoes and fresh basil leaves finished with fresh buffalo mozzarella, Parmesan, wild oregano and Nicola's Olive Oil.

name: Napoletana
description: D.O.P San Marzano tomatoes, burrata, olives, anchovies and fried caperss.

name: Funghi & Tartufo
description: Wild mushrooms, Gorgonzola cheese, garlic, baby spinach, flaked Parmesan and grated truffle.

name: Burrata & Pesto
description: Burrata, Taggiasche olives, D.O.P. San Marzano tomatoes, green pesto, basil and Parmesan.

name: Lobster Spaghetti
description: Lobster cooked in white wine, fresh chilli, datterini tomatoes, garlic, basil and Amalfi lemon, finished with Nicola's Olive Oil

name: Linguine Vongole
description: Fresh palourde clams sautéed with white wine, garlic, datterini tomatoes, chilli and parsley

name: Papardelle al Ragu Bolognese
description: Wide ribbon pasta with slow-cooked beef, D.O.P. San Marzano tomatoes and rosemary sauce with Parmesan

name: Pasta Verde
description: Long string pasta with courgette strips and spinach finished with broccoli pesto, pine nuts, Parmesan pangrattato and creamy burrata

name: Nicola's Spaghetti Seafood
description: Prawns, squid, clams, mussels, datterini tomatoes, garlic, chilli and parsley

name: Profiteroles
description: Milk gelato filled profiteroles with chocolate mousse and warm chocolate sauce.

name: Tiramisú
description: Espresso coffee and rum-soaked savoiardi sponge biscuits with a mascarpone and marsala egg mousse, dusted with Valrhona bitter cocoa powder

name: Pear & Almond Crostata
description: Warm pear and almond puff pastry tart with marsala cream and caramel (allow 15 min)

name: Panna Cotta
description: Set vanilla cream, raspberries,lemon balm and hazelnut croccante

name: Nicola's Toadstool
description: White chocolate, fresh raspberries, mascarpone mousse, iced vanilla parfait and pistachio biscotti crunch served with warm pistachio sauce

name: Formaggi
description: Cheesecake served with balsamic jelly, mustard fruits, truffle honey and carta di musica

name: Nicola's Limoncello
description: Served over shaved ice (Glass 25ml)

description: Glass of house wine
